wikipedia_page.main: Daniel Evans (born 15 November 1988) is a Welsh rugby union player who plays as a full-back.

response: Daniel Evans the Ospreys fullback full back played for the Magpies at Under 15, Under 16 and Youth level before moving to the Scarlets. It was whilst at Parc y Scarlets that Evans gained two caps for Wales on the 2009 tour to North America, making his debut against Canada on 30 May 2009. Having left the Scarlets Evans moved to the Dragons and then the Ospreys. Despite some great regional form at the Liberty Stadium a third Welsh cap has so far eluded Evans.
